name: Arcane Loop
description:
Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • F to toggle flashlight
  • TAB to see inventory and memories
  • Mouse left click or E to interract with objects
Story

You took job as a driver and assistant on an expedition to Antarctica. Now everyone is gone and you are caught in a time loop

Other

This game was made in a week for Brackeys Jam. Made with Godot
